area: Mull of Kintyre to Ardnamurchan Point (15)

forecast.wind: West or northwest, backing southwest later, 2 to 4.
forecast.sea: Smooth or slight to the east of islay and jura, but elsewhere slight or moderate.
forecast.weather: Fog patches at first, occasional drizzle, fair for a time.
forecast.visibility: Moderate to very poor, becoming good, occasionally poor later.
